articles.description: Iron Chefs teaming to defeat rivals, a bigger stadium, a battier Chairman are some changes to Netflix's "Iron Chef" return "Quest for an Iron Legend."
articles.content:
After "Iron Chef America" ruled the Food Network for more than a dozen seasons, the famed cooking competition is back on Netflix.
"Iron Chef: Quest for an Iron Legend" is now streaming an 8-episode … [+5021 chars]

articles.content:
